Text: ReDana for the update would you let Kevin know also thanking him also I will not be at the meeting tonight me and Curtis are going to Good Hope Church to meet with Shaun Will you let them know about the DJ from KSBJ and also Curtis was able to also confirm the former radio announcer from KTSU Dewayne B Cook We may want to use both of them or just one the committee needs to decide Let Bonnie know about the letterhead confirmation so she can get that out to KSBJ I thought is we really should utilize the DJ from KSBJ Thanks Dana talk to you later Grace From To CC Date Tue Dec Hi Grace Kevin asked me to let you know that he spoke to Kim Causey with KSBJ radio station She said that they Kim Causey herself the Program Mgr would MC for us for This is what they will need from us A confirmation letter on church letterhead of the date time location and any special way the MC will be used days prior to the event with check or money order mailed or hand delivered to Attn Charlotte Estrada Wilson Road Humble TX Please include the name of a contact person that Kim will need when she gets to the event Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download
